\documentclass[english]{article}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage[latin9]{inputenc}
\usepackage{babel}
\begin{document}
\title{Multibody frameworks}
\maketitle
\begin{itemize}
\item Genral overview paper: \cite{Lange2007}
\item PyDy: \cite{Gede2013}
\item EasyDyn (Maple, no flexible bodies, predecessor of CADyn): \cite{Verlinden2005}
\cite{BenFekih2011}
\item ROBOTRAN: \cite{Schiehlen1990}, \cite{Docquier2013}
\item HOTINT: \cite{Gerstmayr2013}
\item MBSoft: \cite{Fisette1998}
\item SPACAR (with flexible bodies): \cite{Jonker1990} manual: \cite{Aarts2011}
\item AUTOLEV: \cite{Levinson1990}, \cite{Botz1997}, manual \cite{Schaechter1988}
\item AUTOSIM: \cite{Warren1985}, \cite{Sayers1993}
\item MBDyn (with flexible bodies?): \cite{Masarati2005}
\item Neweul-M2 (with flexible bodies): \cite{Kurz2010}, \cite{Kurz2011}
\end{itemize}
\bibliographystyle{plain}
\bibliography{MB_frameworks}

\end{document}
